---
title: "Number of Samples Analysis"
format: html
---

```{r}
#| label: setup
#| include: false
library(here)
source(here("utils","check_packages.R"))
source(here("utils","functions.R"))
load(here("data","data_constructed","models.RData"))
model_short_sym_imp3 <- model_short_sym
load(here("data","data_constructed_imp5","models.RData"))
model_short_sym_imp5 <- model_short_sym
load(here("data","data_constructed_imp10","models.RData"))
model_short_sym_imp10 <- model_short_sym
```

```{r}
#| label: tbl-full-models
#| tbl-cap: Models of marriage formation using different number of separate samples pooled into a final model that incorporates within and between model variance.
#| results: asis
htmlreg(lapply(list(model_short_sym_imp3, model_short_sym_imp5, 
                    model_short_sym_imp10), convertModel),
        digits=3,
        custom.model.names = c("m = 3", "m = 5", "m = 10"),
        caption=NULL,
        caption.above=TRUE)
```
